contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox pharaoh | Name=Userkare | NomenHiero= <hiero>N5-wsr-s-kA</hiero> | Nomen=''Userkare'' <br>''{{Unicode|Wsr k3 Rˁ}}''<br> ''The Soul of Ra is Strong'' | Predecessor= [[Teti]] | Successor=[[Pepi I Meryre]] | Dynasty=[[Sixth dynasty of Egypt|6th Dynasty]] }} '''Userkare''' ("The Soul of [[Ra]] is Strong") was the second king of the [[Sixth dynasty of Egypt|Sixth Dynasty]]. He is generally seen as one of the leaders who opposed his predecessor, [[Teti]]'s royal line and was most likely an [[usurper]] to the throne.<ref>Nicolas Grimal, A History of Ancient Egypt, (Blackwell Books; 1992), p.81</ref> Alternatively Jánosi and Callender thought Userkare could be the son of [[Teti]] and Queen [[Khuit]] but there is no compelling evidence to back this hypothesis.<ref>Verner, The Pyramids, 1994</ref> Userkare may have been a royal claimant from the [[Fifth dynasty of Egypt|Fifth dynasty]] but he was certainly a rival to [[Teti]] for the throne. Since [[Manetho]] claims that Teti was killed by his bodyguards, theories of conspiracy have been put forward that Userkare was the leader of this conspiracy who then proceeded to seize the throne. The recently discovered [[South Saqqara Stone]] document from Pepi II's reign confirms his existence and assigns him a reign of between two to four years. Teti's son, [[Pepi I]], eventually managed to oust Userkare and succeed his murdered father. In the [[Turin King List]], there is a [[lacuna (manuscripts)|lacuna]] between Teti and [[Pepi I Meryre]], large enough to have fit an entry for Userkare. Userkare is apparently mentioned in several king-lists. Userkare started work on some larger building projects, as shown by an inscription mentioning his workforce. However, no [[pyramid]]-complex has been identified for him presumably because of the brevity of his reign. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://xoomer.virgilio.it/francescoraf/hesyra/ssannals.htm The South Saqqara Stone: Sixth Dynasty Annals] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Userkare | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Ancient Egyptian Pharoah | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{Pharaohs}} [[Category:Pharaohs of the Sixth Dynasty of Egypt]] {{AncientEgypt-bio-stub}}
